ch0140_80_sakaki/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s you. *chuckle* What’s with that wary look?
Don’t worry, I haven’t been up to any trouble.
ch0140_80_sakaki/0101_0701_02_10:
I am a Pokémon Trainer, after all. Seeing me
on Pasio shouldn’t be cause for any suspicion.
ch0140_80_sakaki/7101_0701_01_10: Team Rocket’s philosophy is really quite simple...
ch0140_80_sakaki/7101_0701_02_10: Use Pokémon to make money. That’s all.
ch0140_80_sakaki/7101_0701_03_10:
Unlike other organizations, we don’t deal in lofty
ideals or attempt to hide what we do.
ch0140_80_sakaki/7101_0701_04_10: *chuckle* It’s quite simple, don’t you think?
ch0140_80_sakaki/7105_0701_01_10:
I like strong people. That’s why I’ve had my eye
on you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0140_80_sakaki/7105_0701_02_10:
However, because you possess strength, you’ve
never chosen the path of evil...
ch0140_80_sakaki/7105_0701_03_10:
Those without strength turn to the power of evil
to survive.
ch0140_80_sakaki/7105_0701_04_10:
That is exactly why Team Rocket will never run
out of business partners.
ch0140_80_sakaki/7105_0701_05_10:
Perhaps that might be difficult for someone like
you to understand.
ch0140_80_sakaki/1701_0701_01_10:
As a memento of our acquaintance, I present you
with this.
ch0140_80_sakaki/1701_0702_01_10:
*chuckle* Let’s continue being amicable towards
each other, shall we?
ch0140_80_sakaki/2501_0701_01_10:
Are you familiar with Silph Co. from the
Kanto region?
ch0140_80_sakaki/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s a large company that manufactures and sells
Poké Balls and other items useful to Trainers.
ch0140_80_sakaki/2501_0701_03_10:
Imagine how reassuring it would be to have them
in our pocket... *chuckle*
ch0140_80_sakaki/2501_0702_02_10: There are many useful companies in the world...
ch0140_80_sakaki/2501_0702_03_10: One day, I, Giovanni, will control them all.
ch0140_80_sakaki/3001_0701_01_10:
If I need to brainstorm, I do it in the morning.
That’s when I come up with my greatest schemes.
ch0140_80_sakaki/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio is an incredible piece of land. Perhaps one
day it will belong to... Ahem.
ch0140_80_sakaki/3005_0701_01_10:
Isn’t it past your bedtime, kid? Keep your nose out
of grown-up business.
